/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. A white car can be seen driving down the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
